actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Reserve Act and the Federal Deposit Insurance Act to extend the 2-year prohibition on employment of bank regulators by insured banks and member banks to include bank holding companies.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Reserve Act and the Federal Deposit Insurance Act to extend the two year prohibition on employment of bank regulators by insured banks and member banks to include bank holding companies.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Reserve Act and the Federal Deposit Insurance Act to extend the 2-year prohibition on employment of bank regulators by insured banks and member banks to include bank holding companies.
